attributes.action: make Barbra Streisand an honorary D.B.E
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over more than a forty year period Barbra Streisand has not only entertained millions; but has been a role model for women and a timeless political campaigner and charity fundraiser. She has been given the Legion D'Honneur by the French Government now the British Monarchy should offer her an honorary Dame of the British Empire.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
